mapper.select:
SELECT 'PRIME SERIES' AS CS_TYPE , 10 AS ACT_COUNT, 10 AS COM_COUNT, 10 AS CANCEL_COUNT, 10 AS FAIL_COUNT, 40 AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CS1Y1T' AS CS_TYPE , 2 AS ACT_COUNT, 2 AS COM_COUNT, 2 AS CANCEL_COUNT, 2 AS FAIL_COUNT, 8 AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'FT1Y1T' AS CS_TYPE , 3 AS ACT_COUNT, 3 AS COM_COUNT, 3 AS CANCEL_COUNT, 3 AS FAIL_COUNT, 12 AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM DUAL
